tool_description: Our free currency conversion API is the perfect tool to handle your exchange rate conversions. Stop worrying about uptime and outdated data. Let our servers do the work and focus on more important things.
name: FreeCurrencyAPI - free currency data
title: FreeCurrencyAPI - free currency data

api_list.name: /rates
api_list.description: Getting the latest foreign exchange rates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://freecurrencyapi-free-currency-data.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "freecurrencyapi-free-currency-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
